mapper.update: update stock_news set status = 'n' where news_id = #{newsId};
mapper.select: select * from stock_news where status = 'y' order by news_date desc;
mapper.insert: insert into stock_trade(std_id, tch_id, trade_type, quantity, stock_price, trade_date) values (#{stdId}, #{tchId}, 'S', #{quantity}, #{stockPrice}, now());
insert into stock_trade(std_id, tch_id, trade_type, quantity, stock_price, trade_date) values (#{stdId}, #{tchId}, 'B', #{quantity}, #{stockPrice}, now());
insert into stock_news(title, content, news_date) values (#{title}, #{content}, now());
mapper.update: update holding_stock set total_quantity = #{totalQuantity}, total_investment = #{totalInvestment}, average_price = #{averagePrice}, current_value = #{currentValue}, profit_loss = #{profitLoss}, profit_rate = #{profitRate} where std_id = #{stdId};
mapper.select: select `change`, stock_price from rate_history order by stock_date desc limit 5;

SELECT COALESCE( (SELECT stock_price FROM rate_history WHERE DATE(stock_date) = CURDATE() LIMIT 1), (SELECT stock_price FROM rate_history ORDER BY stock_date DESC LIMIT 1) ) AS todayPrice,
COALESCE( (SELECT stock_price FROM rate_history WHERE DATE(stock_date) = CURDATE() LIMIT 1), (SELECT stock_price FROM rate_history ORDER BY stock_date DESC LIMIT 1) ) - (SELECT stock_price FROM rate_history ORDER BY stock_date DESC LIMIT 1 OFFSET 1) AS priceChange,
(SELECT MAX(stock_price) FROM rate_history WHERE stock_date >= NOW() - INTERVAL 30 DAY) AS highPrice30Days,
(SELECT MIN(stock_price) FROM rate_history WHERE stock_date >= NOW() - INTERVAL 30 DAY) AS lowPrice30Days;
select DATE_FORMAT(stock_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as stockDate, stock_price from rate_history WHERE stock_date >= NOW() - INTERVAL 30 DAY;
